title: Remove Microsoft.Build.Engine, which is 15 years old
body:
Fixes #8826 

### Context
A 15 year old dll is still referenced.

### Changes Made
Removed src/Deprecated/Engine.

### Testing
Run build.cmd

### Notes

commit.message: Remove Microsoft.Build.Engine, which is 15 years old
Fix build errors and remove Microsoft.Build.Conversion

nodes.body: Thanks but there is a lot of work needed before anything can be deleted. Testing VS, considering when it is still used, where it will be serviced from, how it will be acquired when needed, any error paths, breaking change evaluations etc. This is not ready for a PR.
Closing since this needs a fair amount of evaluation, and probably to happen at a major-version boundary.
